description: Scraper user agent configuration. You can add or remove user agents, and change the user_agent value

custom_user_agents.name: none
custom_user_agents.description: Uses the default user agent and do not apply any custom user agent string

custom_user_agents.name: Firefox
custom_user_agents.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:137.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/137.0
